mapper.insert: insert into ec_sim_task (task_id, rule_id, similar_percent, task_create_time, task_state, deal_user, approve_user, split_deal_user, split_approve_user, create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat) values (#{taskId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ruleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{similarPercent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sysDate, #{taskState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dealUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{approveUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{splitDealUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{splitApproveUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{timeStamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{recStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update ec_sim_task set rule_id = #{ruleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, similar_percent = #{similarPercent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, task_create_time = sysDate, task_state = #{taskState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, deal_user = #{dealUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, approve_user = #{approveUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, split_deal_user = #{splitDealUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, split_approve_user = #{splitApproveUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, time_stamp = #{timeStamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, rec_stat = #{recStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where task_id = #{taskId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select task_id, rule_id, similar_percent, task_create_time, task_state, deal_user, approve_user, split_deal_user, split_approve_user, create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat from ec_sim_task where task_id = #{taskId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select task_id, rule_id, similar_percent, task_create_time, task_state, deal_user, approve_user, split_deal_user, split_approve_user, create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat from ec_sim_task

select t1.task_id, t1.rule_id, t1.similar_percent, t1.task_create_time, t1.task_state, t1.deal_user, t1.approve_user,t1.split_deal_user, t1.split_approve_user,t1.rec_stat,t2.judge_condition from ec_sim_task t1,ec_sim_cust_rule t2 where t1.rule_id=t2.rule_id and t1.deal_user = #{employeeId} ORDER BY t1.task_create_time DESC

select t1.task_id, t1.rule_id, t1.similar_percent, t1.task_create_time, t1.task_state, t1.deal_user, approve_user,t1.split_deal_user, t1.split_approve_user,t1.rec_stat,t2.judge_condition from ec_sim_task t1,ec_sim_cust_rule t2 where t1.rule_id=t2.rule_id
and (t1.approve_user = #{dealUser} or t1.split_approve_user = #{dealUser})
and t1.task_state in
#{item}
ORDER BY t1.task_create_time DESC
